definition: to make no distinction between what's one's own and what's another's (idiom)/to share everything/to be on very intimate terms
(negative prefix)/not/no
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
that/those/(one) another
this/these

sentences.english: These three traits are what make religion and ritual such good bedfellows.
sentences.chinese: 这三种特征使宗教和仪式不分彼此。

sentences.english: We share everything between and relate well to each other regardless of chinchin or ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 我们不分彼此，相处融洽，不必拘泥客套礼节。

sentences.english: The boys agreed to lump the expenses of their camping holiday.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们同意把露营费用合在一起而不分彼此。

sentences.english: We all be happy, regardless of each other's happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我们都要幸福，不分彼此的幸福。

definition: close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
one's own flesh and blood (idiom); closely related
very close/no gap between them/continuously/unbroken/hard to separate/indistinguishable
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
family-like close relationship (idiom)
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
as close as brothers (idiom); deep friendship
to stick together through thick and thin (idiom)
compatible/consistent/to tolerate (each other)
inseparable
To enjoy blessings and endure misfortune together (idiom); for better or for worse
pinyin: you3 fu2 tong2 xiang3 , you3 nan4 tong2 dang1

definition: as close as one's hands and feet (idiom); loving one another as brothers/deep friendship/closely attached to one another
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
two hearts beat as one (idiom); a kindred spirit
lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent
to form/to forge (alliances etc)
